sect1.title: UNICODEORDER

row.entry: The left Unicode expression to evaluate.
The right Unicode expression to evaluate.
Optional. A string constant containing a valid locale code, as specified in ISO standards 639 and 3166.

sect1.para: The UNICODEORDER function UNICODEORDER function returns either -1, 0, or 1 depending on the evaluation of the left and right expressions. This is equivalent to the <=> equivalence comparison operator comparison operator but taking the unicode locale as the basis of determination. If left < right then -1 is returned, if left = right then 0 is returned, if left > right then 1 is returned.
